oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photochemical reactions in organic synthesis: A novel and efficient route to angular and linear tetraquinanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
PRATHAP, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: squarate esters
polyquinanes
coriolin
anions
beta
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis of angularly and linearly fused tetraquinanes 13 and 15 via triplet sensitized photoreaction of appropriately appended tricyclo[5.2.2.0(2.6)]undecane systems such as 10a and 10d, followed by aldol condensation, is reported. In addition, synthesis of tricyclic systems 10a, d from readily available aromatic precursors such as 8a, b has also been described. Copyright (C) 1996
